entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
